Package com.K05.Mais_Maze_Android_App

Class SettingsDatabase

java.lang.Object
android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
com.K05.Mais_Maze_Android_App.SettingsDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class SettingsDatabase extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
SettingsDatabase class for managing the settings data in a SQLite database. This class provides functionality to create, update, and retrieve settings data.

    • saveSetting

      public void saveSetting(String setting, String column)
      This method saves a setting in the database.
      Parameters:
      setting - the value of the setting to be saved
      column - the name of the column to which the setting should be saved

    • updateLastSetting

      public void updateLastSetting(String setting, String column)
      This method updates the last saved setting in the database. If there are no existing settings, a new setting is saved.
      Parameters:
      setting - the value of the setting to be updated or saved
      column - the name of the column to which the setting should be updated or saved

    • getSetting

      public String getSetting(String columnName)
      This method retrieves the last saved setting from the database for the specified column.
      Parameters:
      columnName - the name of the column from which to retrieve the setting
      Returns:
      the value of the last saved setting for the specified column, or null if not found

    • getContext

      public android.content.Context getContext()
      This method returns the context associated with this SettingsDatabase.
      Returns:
      the context associated with this SettingsDatabase
